data.title: Karl Marx - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: Karl Marx was a 19th-century philosopher, economist, sociologist, journalist, and revolutionary socialist. His ideas played a significant role in the development of social science and the socialist political movement. He is known for his theories about capitalism and communism.
data.text:
Definition

Karl Marx was a 19th-century philosopher, economist, sociologist, journalist, and revolutionary socialist. His ideas played a significant role in the development of social science and the socialist political movement. He is known for his theories about capitalism and communism.
